zh.act_fid_tips_name: EOS账户名是您EOS账户的唯⼀标识，一个EOS账户对应不同权限的EOS私钥，根据该私钥所属权限获得相应的账户权限。
zh.act_fid_tips_password: 密码是您使⽤BitPortal钱包的相关功能时所需要的凭证。该密码对BitPortal以外的其他应⽤是⽆效的。BitPortal不会以任何形式储存您的密码，若您忘记密码，请重新导⼊钱包以重置。
zh.act_fid_tips_invcd: 因目前EOS账户注册的成本所限，BitPortal将向部分⽤用户提供邀请码进⾏EOS账户注册。您可参加BitPortal官方组织的活动获取邀请码。
zh.act_hint_txt_txt: 忘记密码？你可以重新导入私钥重置您的密码
zh.act_fid_error_failed: 创建失败，请重试或联系客服（微信号：bitportal_jamie）进行协助。
zh.act_fid_limit_name: EOS账户名不能长于12位字符

en.act_fid_tips_name: The EOS account name is the unique identifier of your EOS account. An EOS account name corresponds to different EOS private keys with different authorities, and the corresponding account rights are obtained according to the permissions of the private key.
en.act_fid_tips_password: Password is your certificate to use the features of BitPortal Wallet. This password is not valid for applications other than BitPortal. BitPortal will not store your password in any form. If you forget your password, please re-import the private key to reset it.
en.act_fid_tips_invcd: Due to the current cost of EOS account registration, BitPortal will implement an invitation registration system, users need invitation code to register new EOS account. You could participate official BitPortal event to have your invitation code.
en.act_hint_txt_txt: Forgot your password? You can import the private key to reset the password.
en.act_btn_title_term: Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
en.act_fid_error_failed: Account creation failed, please contact info@bitportal.io for help.
en.act_fid_limit_name: The maximum length of EOS account is 12
